resources.string: Displays the number of unread messages along with sender names.
No matching help articles. Please double check your question or feedback, and then proceed.
Please enter an email address and name so that we can reply to your message.
"Thanks, we'll be in touch as soon as possible."
Error sending email. Check your internet connection and try again.
Please enter your email address and name
Failed to login to UserVoice, please try again
If your idea is listed below, then vote on it now!
No matching ideas. Please double check your idea, and then proceed.
Your idea is new or different?
Your idea has been sent to the Textra development team for consideration.
Failed to contact support. Check your internet connection and try again.
For Textra to function it needs to be the default SMS app on your phone.
Textra will need some permissions to work properly.
Your phone is dual SIM capable. To use dual SIMs, Textra needs an additional special permission.
Still optimizing these messages. They will soon appear here…
Textra is very fast once the optimizing is complete. That may take a few minutes…
Optimization is complete: Textra is now blazing fast!
"Welcome to Textra. I'm a simple bot. You can send me anything you want, but I only understand some simple things. For example, you can type '%1$s' to get a tip."
"Sorry, I'm just a simple bot! You can type '%1$s' to get a tip."
Textra was just upgraded to version %1$s
"You can get help by going to Settings > Support. You can find answers there, or ask a human. Do you want me to take you there (type 'yes')?"
Tip: on the right hand side of the screen there are hidden timestamps for each bubble. Drag a bubble to the left to see them. Try it now!
"Tip: tap on a bubble to get quick options. Try it now! Then tap '%1$s'."
Tip: in the conversation list, drag left to reveal the call icon. Drag right for delete icon and message count.
Tip: tap the + icon, then long press the images icon to quickly select your most recent picture.
Tip: in the + panel, long press the camera icon to launch the full camera app.
Tip: in the + panel, tap the gallery icon, then long press any picture to make it larger.
Tip: tap the + icon to add things to a message. Try it now!
"Tip: you can lock messages so you can't accidentally delete them. Lock messages by long pressing them and choosing '%1$s' in the dot-dot-dot menu."
"Important: to make sure Textra functions properly, go to Android Settings > Battery > 'Close apps after screen lock' and turn the Textra entry OFF"
Are you trying to tell me something?
"Thanks, I'll update my little black book"
Starred contacts appear here, so they are only a single tap away. You can star contacts in your contacts app.
Textra SMS is a seriously beautiful, feature rich SMS and MMS replacement app. I really like it, check it out @ %1$s
To delete locked messages, unlock them first.
Your ad-free period is over. Most users continue for free with ads.
Your ad-free period is over. Most %1$s owners continue for free with ads.
Tapping and holding a bubble also enters multi-select mode!
Choose when to send the message
Get 2400+ fun Android Blob emojis to share with your friends!
Get 2900+ beautiful Twitter style emojis to share with your friends!
Get 2900+ fun Android Pie emojis to share with your friends!
Get 2900+ fun Emoji One emojis to share with your friends!
Get 2900+ fun iOS emojis to share with your friends!
Failed to connect to Giphy, please check your internet connection
Something went wrong accessing the content. Please try again.
"The attachment is larger than your MMS '%1$s' setting."
Tap to compose a new message
Send messages from pull-down Notification Drawer.
Initially changes %1$s to %2$s to quickly dictate a voice memo.
Keep %1$s text and all media messages per conversation and periodically delete the oldest ones.
Keep all text and %2$s media messages per conversation and periodically delete the oldest ones.
Keep %1$s text and %2$s media messages per conversation and periodically delete the oldest ones.
Keep %1$s text and all media messages for this conversation and periodically delete the oldest ones.
Keep all text and %2$s media messages for this conversation and periodically delete the oldest ones.
Keep %1$s text and %2$s media messages for this conversation and periodically delete the oldest ones.
Video messages can contain an exploit called Stagefright that will harm your phone. If set, protects by ensuring new video messages cannot automatically run the exploit.
Sends a single MMS message addressed to all recipients. Replies go to everyone.
Sends a single MMS message addressed to all recipients. Replies go to everyone (make sure Your Mobile Number is set below).
Sends a message to each recipient one by one. Replies go only to you.
Pinned to top of conversation list.
If your carrier (or custom ROM) fails to send long messages, try splitting them.
Show counter (once message is 2 lines or more).
You just received a group MMS, and it seems your mobile number is not set up. To avoid sending replies to yourself, please set Textra Settings > Your Mobile Number.
Automatically save pictures to the gallery.

Some carriers split long messages into multiple SMS parts. These parts are often received out of order and that can cause confusion. Convert to MMS to avoid this issue (additional carrier costs may apply).
"Try 'System' if legacy MMS isn't working (for example with Project Fi, VPNs, WiFi MMS, etc)."
Show delivery status: Sent or Delivered.
Note: Textra will be restarted when you change the icon color.
Let Textra choose theme colors for your contacts.
Your app icon has changed! So, you need to add it back to your home screen again.
You have chosen to use Textra for FREE. In return targeted ads will be shown from our ad partners Amazon, Oath, MoPub, Smaato, inMobi & Facebook.
"We value your privacy, and so are letting you know these ad partners may use your phone's AAID (Android Advertising ID) and IP address to show you more relevant ads."
Alternatively, you can Upgrade to Pro, which is ad free.
Please refer to Settings > About > Privacy Policy for more information, including opting out of targeted ads and your right to be forgotten.
Long press on emoji to change skin tone.
When composing a new message, only show mobile contacts.
Show unread message count on Textra icon.
Remove accents and diacritics before sending. Never, Always or only if results in sending fewer SMS messages (cost less).
Show delivery status: Sent or Delivered.
"Tip: customize more than one conversation at once by long pressing in the conversation list and choosing '%1$s' from the dot-dot-dot menu."
Choose what to do about ads.
If upgrading to pro is not for you, we still appreciate your support! Just select an ad position that suits you best.
Select an ad position that suits you best.
"As soon as you've reproduced the problem."
When a message contains a web link, show a snippet of the web page it points to.
Check this if asked by Textra support (Textra will run a tiny bit slower).
Resyncs Textra with a fresh copy of the stock database. Textra can get out of sync if, for example, you have used other SMS apps. All settings stay the same.
"Textra is busy syncing right now. Please wait until it's finished."
To mark all as read, Textra needs to be the default app.
Replace this text with your name, see the context for details.
Textra is written in English, and is translated by volunteers. If you want to help improve the translation, or add another translation, please email us!
Note: choose a smaller value if your carrier is failing your messages (too large).
Textra automatically compresses pictures and videos to fit within this limit, so your carrier will accept them.
The APN settings are carrier-specific. Either search the Internet, or look in the Settings App > (More…) > Mobile Networks > Access Point Names.
"Only set this if your carrier supports MMS over WiFi. Otherwise DON'T as MMS will stop working."
Set this to temporarily activate Mobile Data when sending or receiving an MMS.
Set this to temporarily de-activate WiFi when sending or receiving an MMS. This makes MMS work with T-Mobile WiFi calling.
Textra automatically determined your APN settings. However in some rare cases, these may not be correct. You can override them here.

"After 1 November 2018, Google only allows app updates that use white notification icons, not colored ones. That means your colored notification icons will not work anymore %1$s
However, we came up with an alternative you may like: notification shapes. To set notification shapes, go to Settings > Customize Notifications > Notification Icon.
Enjoy!"
Heads-up notifications typically slide down from the top of the screen and provide a larger and more visible notification. Tap to reply. Swipe up to leave till later.

"Android doesn't provide heads-up notifications when your phone is locked. However, Textra does! The Textra heads-up notification will slide down from the top of the lock screen and provide a larger and more visible notification. Tap to reply without unlocking. Swipe up to leave till later."
Tap + button to make your own custom pattern.
Heads-up notifications slide down from the top of the screen and provide a larger and more visible notification. Tap to reply. Swipe up to leave till later.
Heads-up notifications slide down from the top of the screen and provide a larger and more visible notification. Tap to reply without unlocking! Swipe up to leave till later.
Automatically close Quick Reply popup after sending
"Don't auto close after send, so you can continue to chat (to close, swipe Quick Reply to the right)"
Mark message(s) as read when clearing the notification
Textra notifies the Pebble watch directly for an improved notification experience. To avoid duplicate notifications, please disable notifications to Textra from the Pebble app.
When turned on, messages that have been read to you will be marked as read, and delivery receipts and blacklisting will work.
To avoid duplicate notifications, you need to turn off the SMS permission in the Android Auto app settings.
Clear the notification and mark the message as read.
Clear the notification and mark the message as not yet read.
Reply inline in the Android Heads-up (less features than Quick Reply).
Clear the notification and call the contact.
Clear the notification and delete the last message received.
To turn on signatures, tap the + button to create one
Tap here to make me vibrate!
Tap here to set them yourself
"Textra can't get an MMS sent to you. Please check your MMS APN settings, and tap to retry."
Check Settings > MMS > APNs (tap to retry)
Check Textra > MMS Settings > Activate Mobile Data (tap to retry)
Turn on Mobile Data (tap to retry)
A temporary problem with your carrier prevents Textra from retrieving an MMS sent to you. Please tap to retry.
Your carrier has a temporary MMS problem
Your own phone number is not set
Need to configure your own phone number
Tap here to set your own phone number
Check Textra > MMS Settings > Activate Mobile Data (tap to resend)
Turn on Mobile Data (tap to resend)
Please make sure the SD card is mounted, and try again
There was an error writing to the SD card
To import a VCard, you need to install a suitable app
To call a contact, you need to install a suitable app
To show or edit a contact, you need to install a suitable app
To add a contact, you need to install a suitable app
To send an email, you need to install an email app
To view this, you need to install a suitable app
To share this, you need to install a suitable app
A clipboard manager app has caused a crash. Please uninstall it, reboot, and try again.
Error during send. Please try again.
Long press a search result to get more options, like delete, lock & unlock, and more.
Blacklisted. See Textra > Settings to un-blacklist
To blacklist, long press in the conversation list and select \"Blacklist\" from the menu.
"When blacklisted contacts send you messages they are hidden and you don't get notified about them."
An error occurred with Google Billing (error code %1$d)
"To use this feature, please enable the 'Draw / Display over other apps' permission (also known as 'Apps that can appear on top') for Textra."

"It's considered by Android to be a special permission, so on most phones you access it from the gear or dot-dot-dot icon (top right) in Android Settings > Apps, and "not from the Textra permissions screen.
"Can't find the setting? An uninstall and fresh install fixes the missing permission."
Video messages may contain a harmful exploit that can leave your phone vulnerable to attacks. Would you like to continue?

Do you want to inform Smaato about this ad ? After clicking on yes, and choosing the cause of the issue, an email will be automatically generated. The content of the email can be modified before sending it to the ad quality team.
Is misleading (e.g. simulates a dialog or app component)
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
